intro: Heisteria phylicodes, commonly known as the silverleaf heister, is a flowering plant native to South America. It is a member of the Rubiaceae family, which includes coffee and gardenias. The plant is characterized by its evergreen foliage, which has a distinctive silvery underside. It produces small, fragrant flowers that are typically white or pale yellow. Heisteria phylicodes is often cultivated as an ornamental plant due to its attractive appearance and relatively low maintenance requirements.
